blog.name: phandomsummerfics
blog.title: Phandom Summer Fics
blog.description:
A summer of cheesy plots, corny settings, fluffy, slow burn fics! 'Phandom Summer Fics' embraces it all!

Posting will be during the summer of 2019.

For links on mobile click here.

Run by Amethyst and Viki. For any questions message us on Tumblr or send us an email phandomsummerfics@yahoo.com

title: The collection is now LIVE
body:
It’s finally here! Posting officially begins on 1 June! You can find the collection here or by searching for ‘psf2019′ or ‘Phandom Summer Fics 2019′ in the ‘Post to Collections/Challenges’ bit. (You don’t have to post on AO3, you can use whatever medium tickles your fancy!)

Once you posted your fic (woo!), make a Tumblr post for it and simply send us the link/tag us in the post and we’ll reblog it as soon as we can.

Authors, if you need a beta, please contact us as soon as possible!

Happy writing!

reblog.comment:

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: Mey’s Monthly Memorables
body:
admin recommendations for may 2019

Rose

it became a sapling (ao3) - frostbitten_cheeks

Summary: Phil packs his things and leaves. In the journey that follows, maybe he’s only hoping to find answers that would point him back.

(in which phil travels backwards through his memories in order to regain what he’s lost.)

pools of gold & lavender (ao3) - ordanary

Summary: Phil is the day, Dan is the night. The latter had tried to keep them distanced, but when a pesky shooting star causes them to cross paths, it becomes quite clear that distance is the last thing he really wants.

rhymes from another summer (ao3) - deletable_bird

Summary: In which Dan is a mysterious pianist and Phil’s just moved in.

shapes and weights to choose (ao3) - queerofcups

Summary: Getting to interview Phil, Phil Lester, feels like the kind of recognition he’s been working towards for years and Dan doesn’t know how to handle it. (Dan’s a sex toy blogger, Phil’s a nearly-retired porn star. They fall in love, eventually.)

Tori

And (ao3) - iihappydaysii

Summary: Phil’s missing Dan while he’s at uni, and he’s very happy for some unexpected time together.

A Star in the Galaxy (ao3) - danblossom

Summary: The growth from childhood through adolescence of James, Dan and Phil’s son.

“You wonder if the moon comes up at night so the stars don’t feel alone.”

What You Won’t Say Out Loud (ao3) - seabright

Summary: All in the name of fiscal responsibility.

You Give Me Life (ao3) - inlovewiththeirlove

Summary: Dan is pregnant and things are complicated.

blog.name: phanstastories
blog.title: your reupload center for dnp’s insta stories!
blog.description: don’t use instagram but don’t wanna miss out on the insta story fun? this is the blog for you!

summary:
phil's second insta story + 5/31/2019
phil: "they only live for about 12 weeks so I'm trying to make every moment count with...
body:
phil’s second insta story + 5/31/2019

phil: “they only live for about 12 weeks so I’m trying to make every moment count with this little dude. Also, they mate with themselves and lay eggs which is weird, so maybe I’ll have some babies”

summary: phil’s first insta story + 5/31/19 + “tony the triup update! he’s still alive! i kept something alive; be proud of me. and he’s...
body: phil’s first insta story + 5/31/19 + “tony the triup update! he’s still alive! i kept something alive; be proud of me. and he’s kinda turned his tank into a bit of a zen garden by digging along. that’s all he does; he just digs all day. if you didn’t see my last story, you’d be like ‘what the hell is that thing?’ uhhhh-“

title: scandalous
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2WfGV30

by phancontent

Daniel Howell, a well known “emo glam star”, a singer and a fashion icon, faces a writing crisis and decides to hire an unemployed famous songwriter named Phil Lester, who can’t stop blushing with every grin Dan gives him.

Words: 6303, Chapters: 4/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF), Dan Howell - Fandom, Phil Lester - Fandom
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Dan Howell, Phil Lester, PJ Liguori, Chris Kendall, Louise Pentland
  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester, Dan Howell & Phil Lester, Chris Kendall/PJ Liguori
  • Additional Tags: Alternative Universe - Rockstar, Rockstar Dan Howell, Songwriter Phil Lester, glam!dan, shy!Phil, Jealous Dan Howell, Jealous Phil Lester, Blushing Phil Lester, Shy Phil Lester, Confident Dan Howell, Cute Dan Howell/Phil Lester, Glam Rock


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2WfGV30

blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)
